item.description:
DISCOUNT GOLF LESSONS IS PLEASED TO INTRODUCE GOLF 102 – Scramble Tournament Playing Lessons

GOLF 102 – A Scramble style Golf tournament that gives you playing lessons on the course while you compete against other GOLF 102 teams.

Each member of the winning team wins a prize at every lesson!

Gear up for Golf Tournament play and sharpen your golfing skills with 9 holes of golf with our Certified Golf Teaching Instructor.

And as a bonus - continue to play golf until dark at no extra charge!

GOLF 102 – Scramble Tournament Playing Lessons are perfect for the experienced Golfer, beginning Golfers, and GOLF 101 graduates. Bring your own Golf clubs and equipment, or we will provide you with Golf Clubs at no extra charge.

GOLF 102 – Scramble Tournament Playing Lessons are schedule for every Thursday night from 6 pm to 8 pm, and our flexible schedule allows you to select the dates of your 3 lessons.

In case of rain or bad weather, our Certified Golf Teaching Professional Instructor will call you to reschedule your GOLF 102 – Scramble Tournament Playing Lesson.

6 Hours of GOLF 102 – Scramble Tournament Playing Lessons and bonus Golf Course playing time is only $100 online at http://www.GolfLesson... - that’s less than $17 per hour SPACE IS VERY LIMITED SO RESERVE YOUR SPOT TODAY

or you can pay $150 at the Golf Course if any space remains (cash only – please call ahead for availability)

FOR MORE INFORMATION, Visit http://www.GolfLesson...

or http://www.Meetup.com...

or call (860) 436-9949

WHAT OUR STUDENTS ARE SAYING:

“ Golf 101 was a fun and inexpensive way to learn Golf from the beginning. Having never golfed before, I was nervous, but our Instructor George did a great job teaching our group, and I am having a great time in Golf 102!"
Rodney P, New Haven CT

“ Inexpensive, high quality Lessons in a small group, I made new golfing buddies and am enjoying the game of golf"
June B, Bloomfield CT

“ I have taken lessons from golf pros before, but Golf 102 Playing Lessons were more effective and less expensive than any other lessons."
Jim S, Newington CT

“ I was not sure if I would enjoy Golfing so I tried Golf 101 and I love it! The Instructor was very patient and answered all my questions, and made the lessons fun!
Gloria W, Milford, CT

“ I have never played Golf before and I always wanted to try it. I could not afford lesson with a Golf Pro when I came across this web site on the Internet. The lessons where great, I now I have the basics and a decent swing. I will probably take Golf 102 next month. I recommend Golf 101 to anyone who wants to try Golf, or develop a better swing."
Ed D, Enfield

FOR MORE INFORMATION, Visit http://www.GolfLesson...

or http://www.Meetup.com...

or call (860) 436-9949

Discount Golf Lessons CT and www.CTGolfTips.com are proud to be a Better Business Bureau Accredited Business.



See You On The Course!

WHAT OUR STUDENTS ARE SAYING:

“ Golf 101 was a fun and inexpensive way to learn Golf from the beginning. Having never golfed before, I was nervous, but our Instructor George did a great job teaching our group, and I am having a great time in Golf 102!"
Rodney P, New Haven CT

“ Inexpensive, high quality Lessons in a small group, I made new golfing buddies and am enjoying the game of golf"
June B, Bloomfield CT

“ I have taken lessons from golf pros before, but Golf 102 Playing Lessons were more effective and less expensive than any other lessons."
Jim S, Newington CT

“ I was not sure if I would enjoy Golfing so I tried Golf 101 and I love it! The Instructor was very patient and answered all my questions, and made the lessons fun!
Gloria W, Milford, CT

“ I have never played Golf before and I always wanted to try it. I could not afford lesson with a Golf Pro when I came across this web site on the Internet. The lessons where great, I now I have the basics and a decent swing. I will probably take Golf 102 next month. I recommend Golf 101 to anyone who wants to try Golf, or develop a better swing."
Ed D, Enfield

"Golf 102 gave me experience of playing in 3 competitive golf scrambles while the golf instructor helped me fix some problems I had. I improve my game, had a lot of fun, and met some great people!. I got almost 10 hours of course time with the lessons for $100 – which is less money that just playing without lesson!"
David P, New Haven, CT
